con:testCase.name: GoodCases-DEV-chargeCustomer-Pain008-Tenant-1-Brand-1
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests generation of sepa-file for bank after registration recharge with all supported options
Please be aware, that expected sepa-file in xml format is in assertion from jdbc-response. Expected values in sepa-files are dependend from values in requests

con:config.con:query: SELECT * FROM TASK WHERE PARAMETERS like '%${#TestCase#MSISDN}%' order by ID desc

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <Results> <ResultSet fetchSize="10"> <Row rowNumber="1"> <ID>10004206</ID> <TASK_TYPE_ID>5</TASK_TYPE_ID> <STATUS>SUCCESSFUL</STATUS> <CREATION_DATE>2016-05-04 17:44:00.0</CREATION_DATE> <LAST_PROPAGATION_DATE>2016-05-04 17:44:00.0</LAST_PROPAGATION_DATE> <PROPAGATION_ATTEMPTS>1</PROPAGATION_ATTEMPTS> <PARAMETERS><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><TaskDetails xmlns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/task_types/TaskDetails"><OcsExternalNotification operationCode="UL" subOperationCode="5" opReference="5ebb5edf-dec2-4fa5-85ec-fdf1ecca6e7e" msisdn="4917661694849"><OcsThresholdNotification value="400"/></OcsExternalNotification><taskTarget>PPIT</taskTarget><targetResponseHistory><targetResponseData><responseStatus>SUCCSESSFUL</responseStatus><propagationTimestamp>2016-05-04T17:44:00.442+02:00</propagationTimestamp></targetResponseData></targetResponseHistory></TaskDetails>]]></PARAMETERS> </Row> <Row rowNumber="2"> <ID>10004205</ID> <TASK_TYPE_ID>3</TASK_TYPE_ID> <STATUS>NEW</STATUS> <CREATION_DATE>2016-05-04 17:43:59.0</CREATION_DATE> <LAST_PROPAGATION_DATE/> <PROPAGATION_ATTEMPTS>0</PROPAGATION_ATTEMPTS> <PARAMETERS><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><TaskDetails xmlns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/task_types/TaskDetails"><BalanceCheckAfterRegistration msisdn="4917661694849"/><taskTarget>OCS</taskTarget><targetResponseHistory/></TaskDetails>]]></PARAMETERS> </Row> </ResultSet> </Results>

con:config.con:query: Select PARAMETERS From TASK WHERE TASK_TYPE_ID=9 AND ID=(SELECT MAX(ID) From TASK)
